body: Adding a refinement to this ticket:  As posted by Darrell in the linked comment - the requirement is:  Add `Does Entity X have Authorization Y, in the context of Ecosystem Governance Framework Z?` to the scope section of the specification (and ensure it makes sense in context with the rest of the text)
This was discussed during the [#did meeting on 21 November 2024](https://www.w3.org/2024/11/21-did-minutes.html#4c13).
